item.title: SpaceX Starship rocket explodes minutes after launch from Texas
item.description: - SpaceX's new Starship rocket exploded minutes after launch in its first test flight, crashing into the Gulf of Mexico - The rocket was intentionally destroyed by its self-destruct system after multiple engines on the 33-engine booster failed to fire, causing it to lose altitude and tumble - The rocket reached a maximum speed of about 1,300 mph (2,100 kph) and as high as 24 miles (39 kilometers), before going sideways and dropping - Despite the failed launch, congratulations poured in from NASA chief Bill Nelson and others in the space industry, with many saying it represented significant progress toward a reusable super-heavy lift rocket - SpaceX has more boosters and spacecraft lined up for more test flights, with CEO Elon Musk saying they had learned a lot for the next launch in a few months.

item.title: Spinning Diagrams with CSS
item.description: - The spinning diagrams presented do not use JavaScript or animated image formats; rather, just HTML and CSS.

item.title: Mullvad VPN was subject to a search warrant â€“ customer data not compromised
item.description: - Mullvad VPN was visited by police officers from the National Operations Department of the Swedish Police with a search warrant to seize computers with customer data.

item.title: Shutting down my legal torrent site after 17 years
item.description: - Legit Torrents, a legal torrent tracking site, shut down after 17 years due to hosting issues.

item.title: Google DeepMind
item.description: - Google DeepMind is a new single, focused unit created by combining the talents and efforts of DeepMind and the Brain team from Google Research.

item.title: Only one pair of distinct positive integers satisfy the equation m^n = n^m
item.description: - The article presents a proof for a number theoretic result, which shows that only one pair of distinct positive integers satisfies the equation n^m = m^n.

item.title: Show HN: A 15 min daily stretch routine for desk workers
item.description: - A free 15-minute stretch routine has been created for desk workers to help them avoid aches and pains.

item.title: Rural Americans are importing tiny Japanese pickup trucks
item.description: - Rural Americans are importing tiny Japanese pickup trucks known as "Kei" trucks to take advantage of tax laws in Japan that allow smaller vehicles to be taxed less.

item.title: Imgur Updates TOS, Banning NSFW Content
item.description: - Imgur has updated its Terms of Service to ban NSFW (not safe for work) content.

item.title: BuzzFeed News is shutting down
item.description: - BuzzFeed News is shutting down, according to the company's CEO Jonah Peretti in a company-wide memo on Thursday.
